title: SK Capital Is Said to Near Deal for Drug Distributor Swixx
description: US private equity firm SK Capital Partners is nearing a deal to acquire Swiss drug distribution company Swixx Biopharma SA, according to people familiar with the matter.
content: US private equity firm SK Capital Partners is nearing a deal to acquire Swiss drug distribution company Swixx Biopharma SA, according to people familiar with the matter.
